alert.note: Alert for Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued October 13 at 2:06PM EDT until October 13 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL ONEIDA COUNTY... At 206 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles west of Highmarket to Verona Beach, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Rome, Lee, Vienna, Floyd, Camden, Boonville, Forestport, Steuben, Sylvan Beach and Ava. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
